root: ^[Mom] That’s nice of them to offer free donuts! You should take them up on their offer.
^[Mom] I know how much you loved going on donut runs with me.
^[Addison] Yeah… you remember how you would give me a donut every time I got a 100 on my spelling tests? That was fun.
^[Mom] You kept getting 100s after I made that offer, hehe!
^[Mom] Anyways, it’s nice that they’re here for you. If you ever need anything, go to them. They’ll always be there for you.
^[Mom] I have full faith in them.
^[Addison] But I wish you could be there for me..
